titles.title: Be glad in the Lord and rejoice,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be glad in the Lord and rejoice,
Rejoice, rejoice!
Be glad in the Lord and rejoice, ye righteous.
And shout for joy, all ye upright in heart,
Shout for joy, all ye upright in heart.
Be glad in the Lord and rejoice, ye righteous!
